member.name: T:MvcUtil.QueryStringBuilder
member.summary: Provides a set of static (Shared in Visual Basic) methods to convert a to a using the application/x-www-form-urlencoded format.
member.remarks: This class complements which does not provide a way to build the query portion of the URI. It's also useful if you need to send the query string in the body of an HTTP request.
